name: Building Blox
description:
Building Blox was/is a personal project to gain a deeper understanding of best practices when constructing a system of styles and nested components in Figma.


UI kits abound in the Figma community so why go through the trouble of building one from scratch? Simple: learn by doing.


Did I screw something up? Let me know!


Got a better way to handle things? Let me know that too!



Version history:

v1.5: Change Log added! Color palette updated, IconWrapper added. See change log for details. Happy New Year!


v1.2: Updated spacing of Close button in Modals.


v1.1: Changed the typeface to Open Sans for better clarity at small sizes.
